frontmatter.title: TIL: Firefox Bookmarks Export - HTML to PLAIN File

node.excerpt: Today I Learned Long long time ago, I started using browser bookmarks and the burden of carrying around them system to system has been a pain. I hope, there are people like me, want to carry forward the legacy bookmarks to beyond. I'm not going to be giving the steps for exporting the bookmarks from firefox, as they are already straight forward. Still, if somebody needs help, please look here. SED to the rescue SED - stream editor, popular choice of most of the sysadmins and hardcore developers…

frontmatter.title: Instant Messaging using erlang and XMPP - Part 1

node.excerpt: Instant Messaging It's a type of real-time text transmission over the internet and if you want detailed description of what it is please look it up here Underlying Basics There are couple of things, we need to understand about real-time technologies: The underlying protocol is not HTTP/HTTPS, but raw TCP with TLS which is equivalent to HTTPS per say also there is a websocket which has been recently gaining popularity in the recent years The afore mentioned protocols heavily rely on keeping the…
